cloudwatchLogsConfiguration.description: The configuration for experiment logging to Amazon CloudWatch Logs. See below.

logSchemaVersion.description: The schema version. See [documentation](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/fis/latest/userguide/monitoring-logging.html#experiment-log-schema) for the list of schema versions.

s3Configuration.description: The configuration for experiment logging to Amazon S3. See below.
